# allBehaviors

**Instance Property**

The list of behaviors affecting bodies in the physics world.

## Declaration

```swift
var allBehaviors: [SCNPhysicsBehavior] { get }
```

## Registering Physics Behaviors

- **addBehavior(_:)**: Adds a behavior to the physics world.
- **removeBehavior(_:)**: Removes a behavior from the physics world.
- **removeAllBehaviors()**: Removes all behaviors affecting bodies in the physics world.
